column4: does anyone know a light web browser that is as functional as firefox but doesn't memory leak?
dillo is very light, but not as functional
off the top of of your head do you know what it's lacking?
i think main thing is flash
you can get graphics with links2
but no way it has flash right
apparently terminal is not an app
Do you know what xterm you are using?
you could do ps -e | grep term to get the process name, then use whereis
you need to use screen for that
screen is what you are looking for
